ROOT.GetSelShuiXiInfo: select name,id from shuixiregion_gcj02 where ST_Intersects(st_setsrid(st_polyfromtext('POLYGON(({0}))'),4326), st_setsrid(geom,4326)) ='t' and name is not NULL and ST_Area(geom)>{2}
ROOT.GetShuiXiInfoByPyname: SELECT st_astext(geom) ,name,id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG shuixiregion_gcj02 where name like '%{0}%'
ROOT.GetRailWayLinePolyInfo: SELECT st_astext(ST_Envelope(geom)) from railway_gcj02 where name like'%{0}%'
ROOT.GetStationByShuiXiPolygon: SELECT distinct stationpoint.gid,stationpoint.name from ys_db.public.stationpoint,shuixiregion_gcj02 where shuixiregion_gcj02.name ='{0}' and stationstate=1003 and stationtype=1002 and ST_Contains(ST_Envelope(shuixiregion_gcj02.geom),st_setsrid(stationpoint.geom,4326))='t' and ST_Distance(shuixiregion_gcj02.geom::geography,st_setsrid(stationpoint.geom,4326)::geography)<{1}
ROOT.GetShuiXiInfoByName: SELECT st_astext(st_transform(st_Multi(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(st_transform(geom, 3857), 200)),4326)),name,id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG riversimple where name ='{0}'
